title: Ebert & Roeper - 05.18.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  May 18th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0499448/]The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0801526/]The Tracey Fragments[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0385006/]How the Garcia Girls Spent Their Summer[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0827517/]Reprise[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0473356/]The Flock[/url]

	--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]
	--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000774/]Sex and the City: The Movie[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0441773/]Kung Fu Panda[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0499448/]The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian[/url]  -  down - (mild) down
-- Peter Dinklage - Ben Barnes - Anna Popplewell - Tilda Swinton - voice of Liam Neeson

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0801526/]The Tracey Fragments[/url]  -  down - (way) down
-- Ellen Page

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0385006/]How the Garcia Girls Spent Their Summer[/url]  -  up - (lovely & touching) up
-- Elizabeth PeÃƒÂ±a - Steven Bauer - America Ferrera

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0827517/]Reprise[/url]  -  (way) up - (way) up
-- from Norway

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0473356/]The Flock[/url]  -  (way) down - down
-- (direct to DVD)
-- Richard Gere - Claire Danes - Avril Lavigne

	---Rapid Reviews - catch up on some of the big movies playing in theaters 
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]  -  (an eye-full) up - (loved the look, style, spirt) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1033643/]What Happens in Vegas[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0866439/]Made of Honor[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0857191/]The Visitor[/url]  -  (way) up - (way) up

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0465234/]National Treasure: Book of Secrets[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0848557/]Diary of the Dead[/url]  -  up - down

	---? Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1012804/]Redbelt[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0827517/]Reprise[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
